title: An entertainment that's as smart, witty, stylish
review: A good one-time-see movie that seems to have been a Sherlock Holmes movie where the rights to the characters couldn't be secured in time, so the movie was made with just an eccentric British inspector.

title: A marvellous, exquisite movie.
review: A warm, funny, bittersweet film that never condescends to her for a laugh, and has got a lot more going on than just pretty pictures. I think this movie focuses on the very intimate moments we have with ourselves.

title: I really liked this movie... I found it a little dark.
review: I quite liked this very dark thriller. Very creepy guy and a scary look at the media.

movie_title: Once Upon a Time... in Hollywood
title: In his 9th film
review: There are a lot of creative liberties, so don't look for historical accuracy -this film is above and beyond that. It is a nostalgic tribute to the Hollywood of old. The production design and cinematography are memorable, The camera follows all the action and accentuates every little detail of the characters and their emotions.
